DOC.brief_summary: This study test whether XAF5 ( XOPH5 ) ointment , apply daily low eyelid 10 week , reduces prominence low eyelid fat adult moderate severe steatoblepharon ( excess eyelid fat ) .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study XAF5 ( XOPH5 ) Ointment Reduction Excess Eyelid Fat ( Steatoblepharon )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( abbreviate ) : Moderate severe low eyelid steatoblepharon ( LESS score 24 bilaterally ) Men woman 4070 year old Healthy facial skin Must understand provide inform consent Exclusion Criteria ( abbreviate ) : Best correct visual acuity worse 20/40 either eye Regular use ophthalmic medication either eye Planned use contact lens study Any history low eyelid surgery
